title: Keralan vegetable curry
ingredients: ['3 tomatoes', '2 cloves garlic, roughly chopped', '1 teaspoon cardamom powder', '1/2 teaspoon clove powder', '1/4 teaspoon chilli powder (optional)', '1/4 teaspoon asafoetida (optional)', '1 teaspoon garam masala', '2 tablespoons water', '2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1/2 onion, chopped finely', '125g cauliflower florets', '125g green beans', '125g carrots', '250g potatoes', '1 teaspoon coriander powder', '1 teaspoon turmeric powder', '400ml coconut milk', 'Juice of 1/2 lemon', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped coriander leaves', 'Pinch of sea salt']
